scenario_text.value:
(Oh, it’s Agumon, Falcomon and Shakomon. All
of them were playing here?)
Welcome to the gang, Shakomon!

Thanks, Agumon! And thanks to the rest of
you, too!

Indeed, welcome to our ranks.
Did you introduce yourself to the children?

Sure did! They looked troubled, though.
Did something happen?

There’s a lot of unknowns, after all.
Everyone’s a bit on edge.

I say things’re just fine as long as we’re
here!

Right, I think so too! We can deal with
anything that comes our way!

If only the children would feel the same way,
things would certainly go more smoothly...

We have to keep them all in good spirits!
Let’s do our best!

(I see, they’re thinking about our best
interests.)

(I appreciate the thought. Still...to think
they have to keep us in good spirits.)

(No, no, their consideration is important.
Should I be adult about this?)

(Hmm, still, it’s a little embarrassing to
come out and say thanks...)
(What should I do?)
Thank them properly.
Speak my real feelings.
Beat around the bush.
There you three are.
Oh, Takuma!

You were thinking of us, weren’t you? Thanks,
I really appreciate it.
Eheheh, aww shucks!

I’ll make sure to work just as hard for
everyone’s sake!
Yeah! Let’s do our best!
There you three are.
Oh, it is you, Takuma.
I heard you guys talking, you know.

I appreciate you thinking of us, but right now
there’s not much you can do to cheer us up.

Hrrm... I see. This is not simply a matter of
feelings anymore.

Exactly. Oh, but of course I’m happy you all
feel that way!

Well, we’ll deal with this problem on our
own.

We’ll need you guys’ help in any fight, so
back us up when the time comes.

Just the ones for the job, as it were. Very
well, we shall do our utmost when we must.
There you three are.
Oh, it’s Takuma.

Um, so... I overheard you guys talking. About
keeping us all in good spirits.

Yep, that’s right! We’ll get you guys to cheer
up!

Yeah... Well, cheering us up won’t take care
of anything by itself.

Still, things have been so uncomfortable and
gloomy, maybe some fun would be better...

Hmm? I don’t know what you’re trying to say
here.

Um, so basically, putting aside whether it’ll
actually take care of our problems...
Let me just say...thank you.

Oh boy... Just give a straight thanks, why
don’t you. All that pointless mumbling.

Sure. I was trying to hide my embarrassment,
but that just made it even worse...
Welp, I’m going to head back to the others.
Then I’ll go with you!
Are those two going to be all right?
Yeah! We’ll play again later!
Gotcha. Okay, Agumon, let’s go!
Yeah!
Be sure to assist Takuma properly.
Don’t go smelling flowers on the way!
Leave it to me!
